title: LLM for Mobile: An Initial Roadmap
authors:
Daihang Chen, Yonghui Liu, Mingyi Zhou, Yanjie Zhao, Haoyu Wang, Shuai
  Wang, Xiao Chen, Tegawend\'e F. Bissyand\'e, Jacques Klein, Li Li
abstract:
When mobile meets LLMs, mobile app users deserve to have more intelligent
usage experiences. For this to happen, we argue that there is a strong need to
appl LLMs for the mobile ecosystem. We therefore provide a research roadmap for
guiding our fellow researchers to achieve that as a whole. In this roadmap, we
sum up six directions that we believe are urgently required for research to
enable native intelligence in mobile devices. In each direction, we further
summarize the current research progress and the gaps that still need to be
filled by our fellow researchers.
